text: It wouldn ’ t be an Emmy Awards nomination day if we didn ’ t feel both elated about some surprises nods, and furious about the shows and people who were egregiously overlooked — snubbed, if you prefer — by Television Academy voters. Here, without further ado, is a rundown of the key shockers and misguided omissions in the 2018 Emmy nominations. The Surprises After eight years, Modern Family was finally left out of the outstanding comedy race. For the first time in the show ’ s history, none of its cast members were nominated for their performances, either.
